results.name: Triangle read by rows: row n lists the proper divisors of n-th perfect number A000396(n).
comment: The n-th row sum is the n-th perfect number A000396(n).
link: Omar E. Pol, Determinacion geometrica de los numeros primos y perfectos".
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Apr 22 2008, corrected Apr 25 2008
